name: 陳美杏
objective: 課程大綱如下： 1.複數 2.解析函數 3.積分 4.級數 5.留數定理及其應用 6.保角映像
schedule:
Complex Numbers and the Complex Plane (2 weeks)
Complex Functions and Mappings (3 weeks)
Analytic Functions  (3 weeks)
Midterm
Elementary Functions (3 weeks)
Integration in the Complex Plane (3 weeks)
Series and Residues (2 weeks)
Final term
materials:
Complex analysis (3st Ed.) 
Author : Dennis G.Zill and Partrick D. Shanahan
